translation.name: Iago Silva
translation.aboutMeTitle: Full-stack web developer with focus on backend
translation.aboutMeFirstParagraph: Enthusiastic about independent projects, with a strong focus on web development, specifically backend using PHP Laravel , Node.js , Python , Docker , and SQL . I have experience in server creation, route management, user authentication implementation, and database integration. My familiarity lies mainly in PHP Laravel , Node.js , and Python , allowing me to develop highly efficient and scalable web applications. I also have knowledge in other languages, such as Java and C# . I have skills to work with database management systems like MySQL and PostgreSQL , as well as with non-relational databases like MongoDB . For encapsulation, hardware resource optimization, and application management, I use Docker .
translation.aboutMeSecondParagraph: Additionally, I have experience in frontend development using HTML , CSS , JavaScript and TypeScript . I also have experience using frameworks like React with Vite , Tailwind and Bootstrap to create responsive, attractive, functional, and visually pleasing interfaces.
translation.aboutMeThirdParagraph: When it comes to version control, I use Git and GitHub to share my projects and portfolios. Professionally, I use Git with Bitbucket for task management integrated with Jira for agile Kanban methodology use. Additionally, I have experience with platforms like Twilio , Digital Ocean , GCP , ClickUP and Asana for various aspects of project development and management.
translation.aboutMeFourthFirstParagraph: I am proficient in Linux , MacOS and Windows , with a primary focus on Linux, but I also use MacOS and Windows when necessary. You can explore my profile on GitHub . Additionally, I share informative articles on my Instagram. You can also view my resume on my website.
translation.footerContent: Let's talk about how our next project will be.
translation.dontFindPageFistRow: Page not Found. You can return to home
translation.dontFindPageSecondRow: , or have fun with this Tetris Game!
